Job Posting:166881 - Position: S25 Software Developer 166881 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 02/14/2025 09:00 AM Through UBC Science Co-op 02/10/2025 09:26 AM Expired ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country Golf 918 347 Leon Ave Kelowna V1Y 8C7 BC Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Salary Currency Salary Job Description The role: 2025 - Summer S25 Software Developer 166881 Co-op Position Kelowna, BC Canada 4 months CAD 5120.0 per hour for 40 Major List Golf918 builds products supporting the indoor golf industry, for making reservations and supporting point-of-sale transactions. We are looking for a full-stack developer to implement features and improve existing workflows for the Golf918 set of products. We require someone that can learn the system, take high level direction on features required, design and implement those features and enhancements, and ensure the implementation meets QA requirements. Knowledge of current development tools is expected, along with AI-assisted development workflows. All work (on the back-end) must have integration-level testing code coverage. The successful candidate will demonstrate passion for building software: side project work will be asked about in the interview. Only 3rd or 4th year students need apply. This role will report into the CTO, who brings 20 years experience to the job in guiding design and leading technical teams. About the Company: Golf918 is a small startup based in Kelowna, BC, started in 2019. The dev team is a team of about 5 developers across Canada and India. We currently support 5 applications for our domain, all started in April of 2024. We leverage only modern technologies and software processes for our work. We follow agile software practices, with Kanban, and we issue weekly releases. There is a lot of opportunity to directly contribute significant feature sets for our products for all team members. The majority of the work will be done remotely, however in-person meetups will be scheduled regularly if travel and budget permits. We use Slack and Discord to stay connected, and a daily standup is held at 10:30am PST. Software development on the Golf918 set of products for booking and point of sale requirements for the golf industry. Job Requirements Technologies Required: • Node/React with Typescript • Express • Postgres w/ Kysely • RabbitMQ • Redis • Docker • Jest for automated tests • Hosted on Heroku and Render • Services-based architecture • Domain Driven Design • JIRA / Confluence • Slack / Discord GitHub • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through UBC Science Co-op Cover Letter Required? Yes Address Cover Letter to Greg Johnson
